Articles.Content:
Mission highlight video at http://youtu.be/ZZLYVS-VrmI

Mission debrief to follow

Any mod 'round here wanna move this to Live From Mission Control???

P.S Read all of the subforum titles BEFORE posting.

Was it really necessary to greet the guy's first post with a scolding?

The Dream is Alive, the ships, mission, and video are all really quite excellent, and I appreciated the way you synced the music to the action. I look forward to your future videos. Please make more!

And i thought i like to overbuild my ships Nice vid - i liked it. And props for the "Ride of the Valkyrie" and "Zarathustra" - now thats a music fitting the epicness of space (and not some cheesy techno )
Nuts, can't view it on my iPad. I'll have to check it out at home.
Wow. That was a thing of beauty!
